attributes.name: JavaScript (and JSON, AJAX)
attributes.description: Besides being very comfortable with the language itself, I'm familiar with jQuery and jQuery UI, Ember.js, Node.js, RequireJS, Sinon.js, REST APIs, and other libraries, APIs, and frameworks. My portfolio (above) has some examples of Javascript projects I've done.

attributes.name: HTML (and HTML5)
attributes.description: I've built several web sites and dozens of wiki pages (cf. Portfolio).

attributes.name: CSS
attributes.description: This web site uses some Bootstrap and SASS, and I'm familiar with LESS, as well.

attributes.name: Automated Testing
attributes.description: I'm familiar with many frameworks, and a go-to on my team for automated testing concerns.

attributes.name: Java, C++, Python, and Ruby (with Rails)
attributes.description: I've worked with each of these languages to varying degrees, in classes I've taken and in personal tinkering projects. For example, I wrote a database buffer manager in C++, an AI for Nannon in Java, and a tool for generating random realistic test patients in Python.

attributes.name: Visual Basic and MUMPS
attributes.description: I used these to write easy-to-use healthcare software that handled sending communications between healthcare providers, their patients, and other providers.

attributes.name: Git and SVN
attributes.description: I've used Git for all of my personal projects (both GUI and command line, with a preference for command line); I've used SVN for work projects.

attributes.name: Linux (and SSH)
attributes.description: I use a Linux virtual machine for my pesonal projects, and I've used PuTTY for SSH.

attributes.name: SQL
attributes.description: I used SQL for operational reports that, for example, allowed health- care administrators to ensure that letters (e.g. result letters) are sent to the correct recipient on time.

attributes.name: Microsoft Office
attributes.description: I'm very comfortable with the MS Office suite, and have written Excel VB macros for various tasks.

attributes.name: Typing
attributes.description: I can type comfortably at 110 WPM (120 on a good day).

attributes.name: French
attributes.description: I'm a native English speaker, but I speak French fluently.

attributes.name: Coffee
attributes.description: I always refill the coffee pot.
